name: Hop Don't Stop
description: Hop Don't Stop is a game of little rabbits who are running fast to collect diamonds for power ups, and of course, there are tons of obstacles that lie ahead over the abyss.  Swipe, squat and jump to dodge and run as far as possible, collect diamonds to improve skills.  to inside the shop and use power ups and swap diamonds to go even further to become the bunny you used to be.  Hop Don't Stop is a funny and colorful action game for everyone
